comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Wrestler Hussane (a Bulgarian Turk, according to one New York Times report) shared a manager with Wladek Zbyszko and Gus Schoenlein.  His first name is spelled many different ways in old newspapers:  Yausouf, Yusiff, Yousif, Yusef, etc.

comment.author: 30817808@N00
comment._content:
Well this great muslim surname is spelt 'Hussein' these days .Terrible Turk is another possiblity.
Youssuf Ishmaelo was the original 'Terrible Turk" : the original, in fact, of all the "Terrible Turks" who invaded western wrestling arenas over the past century.
